pageContext.claim: “Under the last administration, the men and women of Whirlpool saw their job and factories targeted for destruction and yet -- you know the story, right? Vice President Biden he's a real beauty; he let it happen. Foreign-made washing machines were dumped in our market below cost in order to put Whirlpool out of business and yet the Obama administration with Joe Biden watching over freely allowed this grave injustice to continue.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is wrong to claim the Obama administration did nothing and were happy to let jobs disappear, The Commerce Department imposed taxes on Samsung and LG washing machines in 2013 and again in 2015 for its behavior, reported The Washington Examiner, and the Obama Administration blasted Samsung and LG for selling at “unfairly” low prices. The penalties did not stick, however; when South Korea disputed the Obama Commerce Department’s “findings” with the World Trade Organization, the WTO sided with Korea.
